EmailTemplate.subject: Setting up your domain name and SSL
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Before launching your store,we encourage you to set a custom domain name, register it and add a dedicated SSL certificate. Set up a domain and SSL
Log into your store <[[https://login.bigcommerce.com/deep-links/tools/domains?utm_medium=eml&utm_source=post-paid&utm_campaign=email8&utm_term=&utm_content=domain-ssl]]> Improve conversion with a custom domain and SSL To start, all new stores are given a BigCommerce domain. We encourage you to set a custom domain name, register it and add a dedicated SSL certificate. Whether you’re transferring a domain and certificate or need to buy new ones, BigCommerce makes it quick and painless. Ready to set up your domain? Refer to our Domain Overview <[[https://support.bigcommerce.com/articles/Public/Domains-DNS-Overview?utm_medium=eml&utm_source=post-paid&utm_campaign=email8&utm_term=&utm_content=domain-ssl]]> for more information. Add a dedicated SSL A dedicated SSL improves conversion by keeping shoppers on your domain at checkout. For more details, read our SSL overview <[[https://support.bigcommerce.com/articles/Public/SSL-Overview?utm_medium=eml&utm_source=post-paid&utm_campaign=email8&utm_term=&utm_content=domain-ssl]]>. Buy a SSL <[[https://login.bigcommerce.com/deep-links/tools/domains?utm_medium=eml&utm_source=post-paid&utm_campaign=email8&utm_term=&utm_content=domain-ssl]]> Remember: Based on your specific domain scenario, you will want to adjust your email records accordingly <[[https://support.bigcommerce.com/articles/Public/Email-MX-Records?utm_medium=eml&utm_source=post-paid&utm_campaign=email8&utm_term=&utm_content=domain-ssl]]>. {{my.Litmus Test 8:default=editme}}
